languageKey.label: SAV Library Kickstarter > Types > Textarea
Attributes for the type Textarea
xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_all:*,xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_functions:*,xEXT_sav_library_kickstarter_general:*
cols = integer;
Defines the number of cols of the textarea. This attribute overwrites the same attribute in the TCA.
rows = integer;
Defines the number of rows of the textarea. This attribute overwrites the same attribute in the TCA.
